Package framework.components.api

Interface Renderable

All Known Subinterfaces:
InputField<T>, TemplateRenderable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CardLayout, CardLayoutItem, ExternalJavascript, ExternalStylesheet, HTMLTemplateContainer, JSButton, JSCheckBox, JSContainer, JSDateInput, JSForm, JSInput, JSNumberInput, JSOption, JSRadio, JSReset, JSSelect, JSSubmit, JSTextArea, JSTextInput, JSTimeInput, Table, TableBody, TableColumn, TableHead
public interface Renderable
Base interface that defines contract methods available on any component that can be rendered on a web page.
Author:
Rossaye Abdool Kureem Apr 10, 2018

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Renderable addChild​(Renderable container)
    Adds a child to this Renderable
    Renderable addChildAt​(double index, Renderable child)
    Adds a child Renderable at the specified position in the child list
    Renderable addClass​(java.lang.String styleClass)
    Adds a style class to the Renderable
    Renderable addCSSRule​(java.lang.String rule)
    Add a stylesheet rule to be used with this component
    Renderable addEventListener​(EventListener listener, java.lang.String type)
    Adds an EventListener to this component
    Renderable addRenderer​(Renderer<? extends Renderable> renderer)
    Adds a rendered to the list of Renderer used to render this component.
    Renderable clearChildren()
    Removes all children from this Rendereable
    This will not be reflected on the page yet.
    Need to call the method setRendered(false) to allow changes to appear on web page
    void flush​(java.lang.String secret)  
    Renderable getAncestorById​(java.lang.String id)
    Search for an ancestor Renderable with the specified id
    Renderable getAncestorByName​(java.lang.String name)
    return Ancestor Renderable with the specified name
    <T extends Renderable>
    T    		 getAncestorWithClass​(java.lang.String cls)
    Search first ancestor with the specified class name
    java.lang.String getAttribute​(java.lang.String name)
    return The attribute value for the specified name
    java.lang.String[] getAttributeNames()
    return Array of attributes set to this Renderable
    jsweet.lang.Array<java.lang.String> getChangedAttributes()
    return Array of attributes changed during any action
    This is used internally by the default rendering engine for optimization purposes.
    jsweet.lang.Array<java.lang.String> getChangedStyles()
    return Array of styles changed or removed during any action
    This is used internally by the default rendering engine for optimization purposes
    Renderable getChild​(java.lang.String name)
    return First child with the specified name
    jsweet.lang.Array<Renderable> getChildren()
    return Array of Children added to this Renderable
    jsweet.lang.Array<java.lang.String> getCSSRules()
    returns all stylesheet rules associated with this component
    java.lang.Object getCustomProperties()
    return User arbitrary data set to this Renderable
    jsweet.dom.HTMLElement getElement()
    returns the HTMLElement that is created for this container on the browser when this Renderable is rendered
    java.lang.String getHtml()
    return Html set to this Renderable
    java.lang.String getId()
    return The id of the Renderable.
    Although it is possible to override this method and manage the id of this component, it is recommended that you allow the engine to manage it for you to ensure uniqueness of the id.
    jsweet.lang.Object getListeners()  
    java.lang.String getName()
    return Name of Renderable
    jsweet.dom.HTMLElement getNative()
    return The native Html Node managed by this component.
    can return null of component has never been rendered before.
    Renderable getParent()
    return Parent of Renderable
    jsweet.lang.Array<Renderer<? extends Renderable>> getRenderers()
    return List of Renders used to render this component
    Renderable getRoot()
    return The root Renderable for this application
    java.lang.String getStyle​(java.lang.String name)
    return The style for the specified name
    java.lang.String[] getStyleNames()
    return Array of style names set to this Renderable
    java.lang.String getTag()  
    java.lang.Object getUserData()

    Checks if the specified style class is present on this component.
    Can only check single class.

    Checks if this Renderable has a listener of the specified type

    return Whether this Renderable has been rendered or not

    Checks if it is a valid parent.

    Show / hide the component

  • Method Details

    • isValidParent

      java.lang.Boolean isValidParent​(Renderable parent)
      Checks if it is a valid parent. i.e This renderable can be added to the specified parent
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent to check if it can be added to
      Returns:
      is valid or not

    • getChangedAttributes

      jsweet.lang.Array<java.lang.String> getChangedAttributes()
      return Array of attributes changed during any action
      This is used internally by the default rendering engine for optimization purposes.
      Returns:
      Array of attributes changed during any action

    • getChangedStyles

      jsweet.lang.Array<java.lang.String> getChangedStyles()
      return Array of styles changed or removed during any action
      This is used internally by the default rendering engine for optimization purposes
      Returns:
      Array of styles changed or removed during any action

    • getNative

      jsweet.dom.HTMLElement getNative()
      return The native Html Node managed by this component.
      can return null of component has never been rendered before.
      Returns:
      The native Html Node managed by this component.

    • getChild

      Renderable getChild​(java.lang.String name)
      return First child with the specified name
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the Renderable to find
      Returns:
      First child with the specified name

    • removeChild

      Renderable removeChild​(Renderable r)
      return The Renderable to remove
      Parameters:
      r - renderable to remove
      Returns:
      The Renderable to remove

    • clearChildren

      Renderable clearChildren()
      Removes all children from this Rendereable
      This will not be reflected on the page yet.
      Need to call the method setRendered(false) to allow changes to appear on web page
      Returns:
      The current renderable with all children removed

    • getRenderers

      jsweet.lang.Array<Renderer<? extends Renderable>> getRenderers()
      return List of Renders used to render this component
      Returns:
      List of Renders used to render this component

    • addRenderer

      Renderable addRenderer​(Renderer<? extends Renderable> renderer)
      Adds a rendered to the list of Renderer used to render this component.
      Parameters:
      renderer - Renderer to add to this component
      Returns:
      This current Renderable

    • getId

      java.lang.String getId()
      return The id of the Renderable.
      Although it is possible to override this method and manage the id of this component, it is recommended that you allow the engine to manage it for you to ensure uniqueness of the id.
      Returns:
      The id of the Renderable.

    • addClass

      Renderable addClass​(java.lang.String styleClass)
      Adds a style class to the Renderable
      Parameters:
      styleClass - The style class to add
      Returns:
      The current Renderable

    • hasClass

      boolean hasClass​(java.lang.String styleClass)
      Checks if the specified style class is present on this component.
      Can only check single class. Will throw an error if trying to check multiple classes at once
      E.g.
      Correct:
      r.hasClass("myclass")

      Error:
      r.hasClass("myclass1 myclass2")
      Parameters:
      styleClass - The class to check if present
      Returns:
      Whether the specified styleclass is present or not

    • toggleClass

      Renderable toggleClass​(java.lang.String styleClass)
      Will toggle the specified class on the component. i.e. If the specified styleclass is present, it will remove it, and if it is not present, it will add it
      Note that this method internally uses hasClass(String) to check if styleclass is present. This means that is works only on single class. Cannot toggle multiple classes at once.
      Parameters:
      styleClass - The style class
      Returns:
      The update state of the current component

    • removeClass

      Renderable removeClass​(java.lang.String cls)
      Removes the specified class from the component
      Parameters:
      cls - The style class to remove
      Returns:
      The current Renderable

    • addChild

      Renderable addChild​(Renderable container)
      Adds a child to this Renderable
      Parameters:
      container - The Renderable to add
      Returns:
      The current Renderable

    • addChildAt

      Renderable addChildAt​(double index, Renderable child)
      Adds a child Renderable at the specified position in the child list
      Parameters:
      index - Position in the child list
      child - the child to add
      Returns:
      The current Renderable

    • setVisible

      Renderable setVisible​(boolean b)
      Show / hide the component
      Parameters:
      b - to show or hide the component
      Returns:
      The current Renderable

    • addEventListener

      Renderable addEventListener​(EventListener listener, java.lang.String type)
      Adds an EventListener to this component
      Parameters:
      listener - Implementation of the event listner
      type - Type of event. e.g click, dblclick, keyup, keydown etc etc.
      Returns:
      The current Renderable

    • render

      void render()
      render this component. Letting the engine decide the best place to append this Renderable
